pull.title: Update the vcpkg checkout commit ID in appveyor config
pull.body:
A recent appveyor vm update broke the build of the `berkeleydb` vcpkg dependency, see #19839. The temporary resolution was to switch back to the previous appveyor vm.

This PR updates the pegged vcpkg commit ID to the most recent commit as of 31 Aug 2020. That commit ID has been tested against the latest appveyor vm and is able to build Bitcoin Core successfully. 

The vcpkg bump includes a [patch](https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/pull/12870) to the `berkeleydb` build config which allows it to be built on the latest appveyor vm.

issue.title: [0.19] Backports
issue.body:
Backports the following to the 0.19 branch:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19194 - util: Don't reference errno when pthread fails. - not clean.
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19536 - qt, build: Fix QFileDialog for static builds
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19777 - docs: Correct description for getblockstats's txs field
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19836 - rpc: Properly deserialize txs with witness before signing
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20095 - CI: Bump vcpkg commit ID to get new msys mirror list
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20141 - Avoid the use of abs64 in timedata
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20142 - [0.20] build: set minimum required Boost to 1.48.0

events.body: This or #20095 will be backported to 0.19 in #20150.

issue.title: Bitcoin 0.20.1
issue.body:
Updates the codebase to Bitcoin 0.20.1 which includes the following merges from Bitcoin.

doc: Update 0.20.1 release notes with psbt changes - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19636
0.20: Add txids with non-standard inputs to reject filter - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19680
[Backport] #19839 and #19842 to v0.20 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20008
[0.20] lint: fix shellcheck URL in CI install - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19612
doc: move-only release notes for 0.20.1 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19482
psbt: Increment input value sum only once per UTXO in decodepsbt - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19517
[0.20] Fix GBT: Restore "!segwit" and "csv" to "rules" key - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19019
[0.20] Add missing QPainterPath include - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19170
[0.20] Backports - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19224

Also includes a commit to restore 0.20 behaviour that was reverted during the initial 0.20 port for backwards compatibility related to the marker cache, this was included here due to compilation errors with the other changes in this PR. The change moves the call that removes TXs from the marker cache.

Move marker cache removal to be consistent with 0.20 - https://github.com/OmniLayer/omnicore/commit/eb360406c3491f948656a6c9dcf6bf47f56869ee
